content:
Hi, I’m Akash! I’m a 5th-year Dual Degree student, advised by Prof. Mitesh Khapra, at Indian Institute of Technology Madras.
I’m passionate about exploring new areas that can solve important real-life problems. I primarily work in the field of Machine Learning and its applications in Natural Language Processing. I have published a few papers in top conferences and journals such as TACL, ACL, EMNLP. I have worked as an intern at startups, research labs, and corporates.
